text: 🚨 Russia-Ukraine war: who will finance Ukraine’s defense? 💥🇺🇸 The Senate bill is not the answer! 🚫 We need a collective effort to support Ukraine, not just a one-time aid package. 🤝🇺🇦 Ukraine’s president is right: without sufficient military aid, they will lose the war. 💔 It’s time for NATO to step up and take responsibility for coordinating arms support. 💪💰 A 5-year, 100bn euro package of military aid is a good start. 💸 But we must do more to ensure a fair distribution of resources. 🌎🚨 The Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative is crucial, but we can’t rely on the US alone. 🇺🇸 It’s time for Europe to step up and take its share of the responsibility. 🇪🇺💬 What do you think? Who should finance Ukraine’s defense? 🤔 Let’s discuss! 💬🌟
